article_text:
‘Health For All’ bill clears state Senate, makes way to Assembly

Measure would allow undocumented people to buy health insurance

Sen. Cannella votes yes on bill, says it’s ‘common-sense solution’

article_metadata.title: Senate approval of ‘health for all’ bill gives new hope to Merced’s undocumented workers | The Merced Sun-Star

og.description: Two years ago, Merced resident Adelina Hernandez was forced to quit her job in the fields.
og.title: Senate approval of ‘health for all’ bill gives new hope to Merced’s undocumented workers
